title: The King Never Smiles
author: Paul M. Handley
description: "The King Never Smiles" is a detailed biography of Thailand's King Bhumibol Adulyadej. Paul M. Handley provides a counter-narrative to the official hagiography, exploring the King's life, his political influence, and the development of modern Thai monarchy.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving every day. James Clear reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.

title: Prisoners of Geography
author: Tim Marshall
description: Tim Marshall examines the physical world to explain why global politics often plays out the same way. By looking at 10 maps, he illustrates how geography limits the choices of world leaders and explains the strategic moves of superpowers.
